While in Complete Combustion, increases SPD by <orangeStrong>{{3}}</orangeStrong>, and when using the Enhanced Basic ATK or Enhanced Skill, increases this unit's Weakness Break efficiency by {{2, percent}}% and the Break DMG dealt by SAM to the enemy targets by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting until this current attack ends.\nA countdown timer for the Complete Combustion state appears on the Action Order.
